hero.title: Welcome to {osu_guessr}
hero.subtitle: Challenge your {osu_base} memory, discover hidden gems, and climb the global rankings in this ultimate guessing game

totalPlayers.title: Total Players
totalPlayers.description: Players who signed up to play

highScore.title: High Score
highScore.description: Current highest score in one game

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect and store only the minimum amount of information necessary to provide {osu_guessr} services:

items.profile: Your osu! profile information (username, ID, avatar)

items.progress: Maintaining your game progress and statistics
items.improvement: Improving game performance and user experience

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We take the following measures to protect your data:

items.access: Limited access to user data by administrators

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use the following third-party services:

items.osu: osu! API for authentication and beatmap data
items.analytics: Analytics services to improve user experience
items.cdn: Content delivery networks for improved performance

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. You can request data deletion by contacting us.
dataRetention.gameStats: Game statistics and scores are retained indefinitely for historical and competitive purposes.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For any privacy-related questions or requests, contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using {osu_guessr}, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

eligibility.title: User Eligibility
eligibility.description: To use {osu_guessr}, you must meet the following requirements:

items.age: You must be at least 13 years old
items.account: You must have a valid osu! account
items.rules: You must comply with osu!'s terms of service

items.cheating: Use cheats, automation, or other methods to gain unfair advantages
items.abuse: Abuse, harass, or threaten other users
items.interference: Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including:

items.violation: Violation of these Terms of Service
items.deletion: Upon osu! account deletion or suspension

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: {osu_guessr} is not affiliated with or endorsed by osu! or ppy Pty Ltd.
disclaimer.warranty: The service is provided 'as is' without any warranty or guarantee of any kind.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify or replace these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the website.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

sessionLoading.title: Loading {osu_guessr}
sessionLoading.funFact: Did you know? I didn't either!

whatIs.title: What is {osu_guessr}?
whatIs.description1: {osu_guessr} is an engaging trivia game that challenges {osu_base} players to test their knowledge of the vast beatmap library. Whether you're a casual player or a hardcore mapper, this game offers a fun way to discover new songs and show off your familiarity with the community's diverse musical collection.
whatIs.description2: Compete with friends, climb the leaderboards, and maybe even discover some new favorite beatmaps along the way!

background.title: Background Guessr
background.description: Test your ability to recognize songs from their beatmap backgrounds. From anime screenshots to abstract art, how well do you know these iconic images?

audio.title: Audio Guessr
audio.description: Put your musical knowledge to the test! Listen to short clips from beatmaps and try to identify the song before time runs out.

skin.title: Skin Guessr
skin.description: Think you know your {osu_base} skins? Challenge yourself to recognize popular skins from gameplay screenshots and menu elements.

more.title: More Modes
more.description: We're working on exciting new game modes for you. Stay tuned!

1.title: Choose Your Mode
1.description: Select from available game modes based on your preference - backgrounds, audio clips, or skins.

2.title: Start Guessing
2.description: You'll have {seconds} seconds per round to identify the correct song. Type your guess or use the auto-complete suggestions.

3.title: Score Points
3.description: Earn points based on accuracy and speed. Build streaks for bonus points and compete for high scores!

leaderboards.title: Leaderboards
leaderboards.description: Compete globally with other players. Separate leaderboards for each game mode let you showcase your expertise!

autoComplete.title: Auto-Complete
autoComplete.description: Smart suggestion system helps you find the right song title without requiring perfect spelling.

profiles.title: Player Profiles
profiles.description: Track your progress, view stats, and see your ranking across different game modes.

api.title: API Access
api.description: Developers can integrate with our API to create their own tools and applications.

api.title: API Documentation
api.description: Want to integrate with {osu_guessr}? Our comprehensive API documentation has everything you need to get started.

technical.title: Technical Details
technical.description: Interested in how the game works under the hood? Check out our detailed technical documentation.

items.creators: • All beatmap creators and skin designers

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: Found a bug? Have a suggestion? Want to contribute? Visit our GitHub repository to:

items.bugs: • Submit bug reports and feature requests

background.title: Background Guessr
background.description: Identify the song based on the beatmap background image

audio.title: Audio Guessr
audio.description: Recognize the song from a short audio clip

skin.title: Skin Guessr
skin.description: Identify popular {osu_base} skins from UI elements

description.audio: You'll hear short clips from osu! songs
description.background: You'll be shown beatmap backgrounds from osu!
description.skin: You'll see screenshots of popular osu! skins

classic.time: Try to guess the song title within {seconds} seconds per round
classic.points: Earn points based on speed and accuracy
classic.streak: Build a streak for bonus points

death.continuous: Keep playing until you make a mistake
death.time: Try to guess the song title within {seconds} seconds per round

classic.timeBonus: Time Bonus: {points} points per second remaining
classic.streakBonus: Streak Bonus: {points} points per streak level

death.noPoints: Points are not recorded in this mode
death.compete: Compete for the longest streak on the leaderboard

classic.title: Classic Mode
classic.description: 10 rounds, score as many points as you can

warning.title: Important Note
warning.description: Your score will only be counted if you complete all {rounds} rounds. Leaving the game early will forfeit your progress!

classic.title: Classic Mode
classic.description: 10 rounds, score as many points as you can

items.enter: Enter - Submit guess / Next round / Select the highlighted suggestion

comingSoon.title: {mode} Guessr
comingSoon.subtitle: Coming Soon!
comingSoon.description: We're working hard to bring you the {mode} guessing game mode. Stay tuned for updates!

expectations.audio: Test your music knowledge by identifying osu! songs from short audio clips. How many can you recognize?
expectations.skin: Challenge yourself to recognize popular osu! skins from gameplay screenshots. Perfect for skin enthusiasts!

audio.instructions: Listen to the audio and try to guess the song title!
audio.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.empty: No players found for this game mode.

recentGames.title: Recent Games
recentGames.noGames: No games played in the last 24 hours

notFound.title: User Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the user you're looking for.
notFound.subDescription: The user might not exist or hasn't signed up for {osu_guessr} yet.

search.title: Search Users
search.description: Search for {osu_base} users by their username

points.1: Keep your API keys secure and never share them publicly
points.2: If a key is exposed, delete it immediately and create a new one
points.3: Each key has full access to your account's API capabilities
points.4: API keys are stored securely and cannot be retrieved after creation

create.title: Create New API Key
create.description: Enter a name for your new API key. This will help you identify it later.

warning.title: Important
warning.description: You will only see the API key once after creation. Make sure to copy it immediately as it cannot be recovered later.

warning.title: Copy Your API Key Now
warning.description: This is your only chance to copy this API key. For security reasons, it will never be displayed again.

delete.title: Delete API Key
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete the API key "{name}"?
delete.warning: This action cannot be undone and will immediately revoke access for any services using this key.

keyInfo.maxKeys: Maximum number of API keys reached (5)

errors.maxKeysReached: Maximum number of API keys (5) reached

support.title: Support {osu_guessr}
support.description: Help support the development and maintenance of {osu_guessr} by becoming a supporter!

items.badge: Exclusive supporter badge on your profile

donate.title: Become a Supporter
donate.description: Support {osu_guessr} with a one-time donation through Buy Me a Coffee. Any donation amount will grant you supporter status permanently!
donate.reminder: Please include your osu!guessr username or user ID in your donation message to receive supporter benefits!

twitter.title: Follow on Twitter

required.title: Sign in Required

required.subDescription: Sign in to track your scores, compete on the leaderboard, and save your progress!
required.noAccount: Don't have an {osu_base} account? Create one here

exitGame.classicComplete: Are you sure you want to exit? Your score will be saved.
exitGame.death: Are you sure you want to end your run? Your highest streak will be saved.
